history.content:
TL;DR: BMT is recruiting technical interns, a diversity chair, public relations assistants. Click the link below to apply.

Application: https://forms.gle/ZSe6VEzbqVzaLzYX6

The Berkeley Math Tournament (BMT) is the Bay Area’s largest student-run math competition. Twice a year, elementary, middle, and high schoolers compete in a series of exams, solve puzzles, attend talks by prominent mathematicians, and gain even more exposure to the wonderful world of math! This year we are running our first ever online tournament, and we need your help. If you have an interest in community involvement, event planning, education, or learning about web development, we invite you to check us out! This Fall, we are recruiting technical interns, a diversity chair, and public relations assistants. Please see the google form for further details on the positions and feel free to contact berkeleymt@gmail.com if you have any questions! To view our application, follow the link above. For more information on our organization see bmt.berkeley.edu. The Deadline for applications is Sunday, September 27th at midnight.
history.subject: The Berkeley Math Tournament is Recruiting!
